headline: Barclays Maintains Overweight Rating on Expand Energy (EXE) Citing Durable Cash Return Models
summary: Expand Energy Corporation (NASDAQ:EXE) is one of the best inexpensive stocks to buy now. On January 21, Barclays lowered its price target on Expand Energy to $126 from $136 while keeping an Overweight rating. In a Q4 2025 preview of the E&P sector, Barclays updated its ratings and price targets and noted that the upstream […]
